content: adding “instead of nothing” prevents beginning directly w/ beings as unquestionably given [?] > forfeit the self-evidence of beings > cannot wholly belong to any thing, not even ourselves ([still] Da-sein “in each case mine”) > in this question, beings come to waver (btwn Being and not-Being), questioning loses secure foothold, Dasein comes into suspense, maintains itself in suspense [what kind of maintenance is this?]
